bib.title: Distributed network intrusion detection systems: An artificial immune system approach
bib.author: Igbe, Obinna and Darwish, Ihab and Saadawi, Tarek
bib.abstract: (NIDS) must analyze a large volume of data while not placing a significant added load on the  monitoring systems and networks. This paper presents a framework for a distributed network  intrusion detection system (dNIDS) based on the artificial immune system concept. In this
bib.booktitle: 2016 IEEE First International Conference on Connected Health: Applications, Systems and Engineering Technologies (CHASE)
